fields.name: Madison Floorstanding Vanity
fields.description_long: Sophisticated and carefully considered, the Madison redefines traditional design with a modern expression. Constructed of solid plywood in a warm Saddle Rock finish with an internal push-to-open/close cosmetic drawer.

fields.name: Liberty Washstand
fields.description_long:
Stylish, versatile and extremely functional, the Liberty Washstand features real timber veneer on plywood, in our Hampton Beech, Belmar Maple, and Saddle Rock colour finishes.

The Liberty Washstand can be paired with our integral basins or upgraded with a slab top and vessel basin. This allows you to customise the configuration to best suit your bathroom design.

  • Four integral basin options
  • Four slab top upgrade options available
  • Full extension soft close drawer
  • Slatted storage shelf
  • 900mm, 1200mm single basin, and 1200mm double basin cabinetry configurations available

fields.name: Mystery Creek
fields.description_long:
The Mystery Creek Laundry Package has been designed with storage and organisation in mind! With a hidden laundry hamper, tall storage cabinet and plenty of drawer space Mystery Creek meets all your storage needs!

  • Nordic Ash cabinet finish with white interior
  • Designed to fit into a 3m space but can be customised to fit any space
  • Brushed Nickel Roma handles
  • 20mm Himalaya Quartz benchtop
  • Soft close hinges and full extension drawers supplied by Hettich
  • Sink Mixer sold separately
  • Select from seven cabinet finishes and two Quartz benchtop finishes

Check out our Laundry Brochure here

All laundry packages include assembled cabinetry, 20mm Quartz benchtop, handles, stainless steel sink and mixer

Laundries are available to order through our nationwide stockists
